comment: I had him for circuit analysis (ee 2301), but the option isn't available. He made things easy and rememberable. if you show up, it'll be a breeze even though attendance isn't mandatory. If you don't that's okay too, you'll just miss his tips

Good guy horrible professor. I am taking him for Signals and Systems and this class is already known to be hard. Well he has made it impossible. Do all hws or you wont pass, test material not covered well enough, and he treats teaching like youre an expert. By far among the worst professors. RUN!
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Accessible outside class--Test heavy
